ca.ubc.magic.icd.android.services
Class AndroidCoffeeShopService

java.lang.Object
  ca.ubc.magic.icd.android.services.AndroidCoffeeShopService

public class AndroidCoffeeShopService
extends Object

A static convenience class that provides various methods and constants for implementing interaction with the Magic Broker database's OAuth interface. Implements the GoF Singleton Design Pattern to provide global static access to all Activities.

One instance of this service should exist for a single OAuth client. Reference to this instance can be obtained by calling getInstance(Context). The constructor of this singleton is public to provide the ability to reset an OAuth session.

Author:
Stephen Kidson, Jeffrey Payan

Constructor Detail

AndroidCoffeeShopService

public AndroidCoffeeShopService(Context context)
A Variation of the Singleton Pattern, this constructor is exposed so we may manually force re-authorization. This constructor should at most be called once for each OAuth session. In most cases, getInstance(Context) should be used instead.

Parameters:
context -
Method Detail

getInstance

public static AndroidCoffeeShopService getInstance(Context context)
Returns the singleton instance of the CoffeeShop Service. If the service has not been constructed yet (by a previous call to this method), a Web Browser intent is launched to prompt the user for authorization.

Parameters:
context - the context to register this instance with. May be null for subsequent calls.
Returns:
the singleton instance of this service.

id - the ID of the bit whose data to fetch.
Returns:
a JsonItem representing the bit.

showUserLinkedToBit

public List<User> showUserLinkedToBit(int id)
Returns a list of users containing all the users linked to the bit

Parameters:
id - the bitID of the bit whose links are to be fetched from the database
Returns:
A list of users containing all the users linked to this bit

authorize

private void authorize(Context context)
Initiates the OAuth dance by fetching a request token. This method will redirect the user from the current context to a WebView for credentials authorization.

Parameters:
context - the context to initate authorization from.

verify

public void verify(Context context,
                   Uri uri)
The final stage of the OAuth dance, verifying the authorized access token. Call this method after the user has been redirected to the callback URI, with the authorized query parameter included. The context from which this is invoked should be, in most situations, declared "singleTask".

Parameters:
context - the context from which the callback was received and to return to.
uri - the URI containing the oauth_token and oauth_verifier.
